Title: Authorizes the assessor of the town of Brookhaven to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from St. Mary AME Zion Church
Summary: Authorizes the assessor of the town of Brookhaven to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from St. Mary AME Zion Church for the property located at 537 Granny Road in the Hamlet of Medford.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the assessor of the town of Brookhaven to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from St. Mary AME Zion Church
